name: Aggressors of Dark Kombat
description: Anything goes to beat-up your enemies! No rules. No limitations for the fight! Aerial battle, provoking, faking, and throwing... anything is available! Weapons, strangleholds, no mercy even to the weakened enemy. Throwing attack? Fist fight? Try whatever you like! Giving 'em a tough attack, My hot blood burns like fire, Men won't stop fighting 'til they gain victory, Sing this winning song, Hot-blooded fighter's march!
